behavior_min_power: On DC or 802.3at, AP operates without restrictions. On 802.3af, USB is disabled unless IPM dynamically reduces other features based on power budget.
antenna_connectors: External RP-SMA connectors for antennas (see datasheet)

behavior_min_power: On DC or 802.3at, AP operates without restrictions. On 802.3af, USB is disabled unless IPM dynamically reduces other features based on power budget.

recommended_poe: 802.3at (Class 4) or 802.3bt (Class 5) or DC for unrestricted operation
behavior_min_power: On DC or 802.3at/802.3bt, AP operates without restrictions. On 802.3af, USB and at least one Ethernet port are disabled and IPM may reduce other features based on available PoE.
antenna_connectors: External RP-SMA connectors for antennas (see datasheet)

recommended_poe: 802.3at (Class 4) or 802.3bt (Class 5) or DC for unrestricted operation
behavior_min_power: On DC or 802.3at/802.3bt, AP operates without restrictions. On 802.3af, USB and at least one Ethernet port are disabled and IPM may reduce other features based on available PoE.
On DC or 802.3at, AP operates without restrictions. On 802.3af, one Ethernet port is disabled and non-Wi-Fi features may be reduced; IPM can apply additional limits based on power budget.
On DC or 802.3bt, AP operates without restrictions. On 802.3at, USB is disabled; 802.3af is supported only for staging with radios disabled.
operating_temp_range: 0°C to 50°C operating; -25°C to 55°C storage; -40°C to 70°C transportation

behavior_min_power: On 802.3at (Class 4), the AP-655 operates in a power-restricted mode similar to an AP-635, potentially limiting bands, features, or transmit power.

On 802.3af (Class 3) PoE, USB is disabled and maximum transmit power on all radios is reduced by up to 3 dB; with IPM enabled, additional feature and power reductions may be applied based on available power.
operating_temp_range: 0°C to +40°C operating; −25°C to +55°C storage; −40°C to +70°C transportation

behavior_min_power: On DC or 802.3bt, AP operates without restrictions; behavior on lower PoE levels is not specified in the datasheet.
On DC or 802.3bt, AP operates without restrictions; behavior on lower PoE levels is not specified in the datasheet.

On 802.3bt (Class 6) PoE, the AP operates without restrictions; operation on a single 802.3af (Class 3 or lower) PoE source is not supported (except for AP staging), and IPM may apply additional feature and power reductions when power is limited.
operating_temp_range: 0°C to +40°C operating; −25°C to +55°C storage; −40°C to +70°C transportation

behavior_min_power: On 802.3at (Class 4) PoE, the AP runs in restricted mode with USB disabled, the second Ethernet port disabled, MIMO operation reduced to 2x2, and maximum RF transmit power reduced by 3 dB; on 802.3bt (Class 6) PoE, the AP operates without restrictions, and operation on a single 802.3af (Class 3 or lower) PoE source is not supported (except for AP staging).
antenna_connectors: 8× RP-SMA (two sets of four for 2.4/5 GHz and 6 GHz radios)
operating_temp_range: 0°C to +50°C operating; −25°C to +55°C storage; −40°C to +70°C transportation

behavior_min_power: On 802.3at (Class 4) PoE, the AP runs in restricted mode with USB disabled, the second Ethernet port disabled, MIMO operation reduced to 2x2, and maximum RF transmit power reduced by 3 dB; on 802.3bt (Class 6) PoE, the AP operates without restrictions, and operation on a single 802.3af (Class 3 or lower) PoE source is not supported (except for AP staging).
operating_temp_range: 0°C to +50°C operating; −25°C to +55°C storage; −40°C to +70°C transportation

behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt or DC, all radios/features enabled. On 802.3at, radios active but USB/advanced features disabled. On 802.3af, radios reduced or disabled.
dimensions: 7.8 x 7.8 x 2.1 inches (20 x 20 x 5.3 cm)

behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt or DC, all radios/features enabled. On 802.3at, radios active but USB/advanced features disabled. On 802.3af, radios reduced or disabled.
operating_temp_range: 32°F to 122°F (0°C to 50°C) operating; -22°F to 158°F (-30°C to 70°C) storage

behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt or DC, all radios/features enabled. On 802.3at, radios active but USB/advanced features disabled. On 802.3af, radios reduced or disabled.
dimensions: 9.5 x 9.5 x 2.0 inches (24 x 24 x 5.1 cm)

behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt (Class 6), operates in quad-radio mode with 4x4 radios on 2.4/5/6 GHz and both 10G uplinks; on 802.3at, operates in tri-radio mode with reduced radio configuration; on 802.3af, all radios are off and the AP is for configuration staging only.
weight: 10.0 lb (4.54 kg) AP; 3.8 lb (1.72 kg) bracket
operating_temp_range: -4°F to 140°F (-20°C to 60°C) operating without solar loading; -4°F to 122°F (-20°C to 50°C) operating with solar loading; -4°F to 158°F (-20°C to 70°C) nonoperating

recommended_poe: 802.3bt or DC for full operation with USB
behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt or DC, all radios operate (2x2 2.4 GHz, 4x4 5/6 GHz) with USB enabled; on 802.3at, radios operate with USB disabled; on 802.3af, all radios are off and the AP is for configuration staging only.
operating_temp_range: 32°F to 122°F (0°C to 50°C) operating; -22°F to 158°F (-30°C to 70°C) storage

recommended_poe: 802.3bt or DC for full operation with USB
behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt or DC, all radios operate 4x4 on 2.4/5/6 GHz with USB enabled; on 802.3at, radios remain 4x4 with USB disabled; on 802.3af, all radios are off and the AP is for configuration staging only.
operating_temp_range: 32°F to 122°F (0°C to 50°C) operating; -22°F to 158°F (-30°C to 70°C) storage

behavior_min_power: On 802.3at, all Wi-Fi radios can operate but USB and PoE-out are disabled and some advanced features may be constrained.
No PoE out, disables USB
R1 (2.4GHz), R2 (5GHz) and R3 (6GHz) operate in low Tx power (17 dBm), with 2x2 chains; R4 operational; USB disabled.
antenna_connectors: Internal Wi-Fi antennas; 1× SMA GNSS connector

behavior_min_power: On 802.3at, all three Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5/6 GHz) operate at full Tx power with 2x2 MIMO. On 802.3af, radios still operate at full Tx power but are limited to 1x1 MIMO, reducing spatial stream capacity.
With 802.3at or the included passive 60W injector, all radios operate at full Tx power with 2x2 MIMO. Lower PoE classes are not specified as supported for full operation.

On 802.3bt, 2.4/5/6 GHz radios operate and PoE-out (PSE) on LAN3 is available. On 802.3at, 2.4/5/6 GHz radios operate but PoE-out on LAN3 is disabled; USB and other features remain supported according to the datasheet.
ethernet_ports_speed: 1× 1/2.5/5/10GbE WAN (RJ45) + 3× 1GbE LAN (RJ45, one PoE-out) + 2× pass-through RJ45 + 1× RS-232

behavior_min_power: On 802.3af, all three Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5/6 GHz) are disabled for client service and only scanning is supported, USB off. On 802.3at, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz radios operate at full power while 6 GHz runs at reduced Tx power (~15 dBm) with scanning and USB enabled. On 802.3bt, all radios operate at full power with scanning and USB enabled.

On 802.3af, all three Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5/6 GHz) are disabled for client service and only scanning is supported, USB off. On 802.3at, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz radios operate at full power while 6 GHz runs at reduced Tx power (~15 dBm) with scanning and USB enabled. On 802.3bt, all radios operate at full power with scanning and USB enabled.

On 802.3bt or 2×802.3at or DC, radios operate at full Tx power with 4x4 chains and USB enabled. On 802.3at or 2×802.3af, all radios remain active but run at reduced Tx power (~17 dBm) with USB disabled.
unknown

On 802.3bt or 2×802.3at or DC, radios operate at full Tx power with 4x4 chains and USB enabled. On 802.3at or 2×802.3af, all radios remain active but run at reduced Tx power (~17 dBm) with USB disabled.
antenna_connectors: 4× RP-SMA (dual-band) + 4 external permanently attached tri-band antennas

behavior_min_power: On 802.3bt or 2×802.3at or DC, all client radios operate at maximum Tx power with 4x4 chains and USB enabled. On 802.3at or 2×802.3af, client radios operate at reduced Tx power (~17 dBm) with 2x2 chains and USB disabled; 2.4/5/6 GHz radios and the fourth radio remain operational.

On 802.3bt or 2×802.3at or DC, all client radios operate at maximum Tx power with 4x4 chains and USB enabled. On 802.3at or 2×802.3af, client radios operate at reduced Tx power (~17 dBm) with 4x4 chains but lower Tx power and USB disabled.
On 802.3af the AP can run 2x2 on two bands plus a 1x1 scan radio in tri-band mode; power is sufficient for full intended functionality.
On 802.3af the AP supports a reduced single-radio mode primarily for cloud connectivity; on 802.3at full tri-band 2x2 operation is available.
Same PoE behavior as AP37: full function on 802.3bt; reduced functionality on 802.3at; radios disabled with 802.3af.
Same PoE behavior as AP37/AP36: full function on 802.3bt; reduced functionality on 802.3at; radios disabled with 802.3af.
antenna_connectors: Two pluggable external antenna connectors: 2.4/5 GHz (4-pin) and 6 GHz (6-pin)

behavior_min_power: PoE PD via Eth0: full functionality on 802.3bt; on 802.3at functionality is reduced; on 802.3af all Wi-Fi radios are disabled and the AP provides only cloud connectivity.

On 802.3af, only a single 1x1 radio plus BLE and scan are enabled to signal that the AP needs more power. On 802.3at, any two radios can be 4x4 or the AP can run three bands with some radios reduced to 2x2; USB and PoE-out are disabled. On 802.3bt, full tri-band 4x4 plus scan, BLE, PoE-out on Eth1, and USB are enabled.
ethernet_ports_speed: 2×1GbE (PoE-in on Eth0, PoE-out on Eth1 when powered by 802.3bt)

behavior_min_power: Same PoE behavior as AP45: reduced radios and no USB or PoE-out on 802.3at; on 802.3af only a single low-power radio plus BLE and scan operate.
ethernet_ports_speed: 2×1GbE (PoE-in on Eth0, PoE-out on Eth1 when powered by 802.3bt)
antenna_connectors: Two pluggable connectors: 2.4/5 GHz (4-pin), 6 GHz + scan (6-pin)

behavior_min_power: On 802.3at, any two radios can run 4x4 or all three bands with some radios reduced to 2x2; USB is disabled but scan, dual IoT radios, UWB, GPS, and both 10GbE uplinks remain enabled. On 802.3af, Wi-Fi radios are disabled and the AP provides cloud connectivity only.

Same PoE behavior as AP47: 802.3bt enables full tri-band 4x4 with all IoT, UWB, GPS, and dual 10GbE; on 802.3at one or more radios may be reduced to 2x2 and USB is disabled; on 802.3af radios are disabled for cloud connectivity only.
Same PoE behavior as AP47: full functionality on 802.3bt; reduced radio chains and no USB on 802.3at; on 802.3af Wi-Fi radios are disabled and the AP provides cloud connectivity only.
antenna_connectors: Three pluggable connectors: 2.4/5/6 GHz (6-pin), 6 GHz + scan (6-pin), 5 GHz (4-pin)

behavior_min_power: On 802.3af the AP can support full tri-band 2x2 plus scan; it is designed to operate within the 802.3af power budget.
operating_temp_range: -40°C to 55°C (with solar load); -40°C to 65°C (without solar load)

behavior_min_power: PoE PD via Eth0: on 802.3at the AP operates with full functionality; on 802.3af all radios are disabled and the AP provides only cloud connectivity.
Same PoE behavior as AP66: full function on 802.3at; on 802.3af all radios are disabled for cloud connectivity only.
